name: Yeeties & Bonkers
description:
Use your powerful pogo-picker to free penguins from iceberg 

every escaped one ads a copy of your hero that starts to move same way as you do. 

Sounds easy?

It would be if not for the Yeeties! Every time they grab a penguin 

they will try to hit you with it!

... so good you have clones to shield you! Good Luck!
